document.full_text: bangladesh's supreme court on thursday rejected a final appeal by "banker to the poor" nobel laureate muhammad yunus against his dismissal as managing director of grameen bank, the micro-lender he founded.
document.title: "banker to the poor" loses final appeal against dismissal
lines_and_colors: bangladesh's supreme court on thursday rejected a final appeal by "banker to the poor" nobel laureate muhammad yunus against his dismissal as managing director of grameen bank, the micro-lender he founded.
